subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Nets, who trail the best-of-seven series, 2-1, entering Game 4 today (in progress), must figure out Miami's Dwyane Wade if they are to get back in the series.
snippet: The Nets, who trail the best-of-seven series, 2-1, entering Game 4 today (in progress), must figure out Miami's Dwyane Wade if they are to get back in the series.
